CustomField.description: LawPay Payments Opportunity Eligible to sell Software To
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Record_Type_Name__c= "LawPay Payments", Referral_Partnership_Channel__c !="Tech Partner", Docketwise_Customer_Status__c !="Active", MyCase_Customer_Status__c != "Active", CASEpeer_Customer_Status__c != "Active"), "Yes", "No")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: LawPay Payments Opportunity Eligible to sell Software To
CustomField.label: LawPay Payments Eligible Sell Software
